name: Fallout Character Name Generator
description: Wasteland wanderer, vault dweller, or super mutant menace? Find the perfect moniker to match your post-apocalyptic persona! Craft a name that's as unique and irradiated as you are. Because let's face it, 'Vault Dweller 27' just doesn't have the same ring to it.
introduction: Welcome, survivor, to the Fallout Character Name Generator! Tired of being called 'that guy' or 'the one with the Pip-Boy'?  This tool is your one-stop shop for crafting a name that's equal parts cool, quirky, and ready to face the wasteland. Whether you're roleplaying, writing fan fiction, or just curious what your Fallout alter ego would be called, we've got you covered.  Get ready to ditch the generic and embrace the gloriously bizarre!
howToUse: Marvel at the awesomeness of your new Fallout-inspired name.
Repeat until you find a name that makes you feel like you could take on a Deathclaw... or at least a radroach.
Optional: Add a backstory.  (Is 'Rusty' a reference to your rusty armor, or your rusty personality?  The choice is yours!)
Go forth and conquer the wasteland, with a name that's as legendary as you are!

faqs.question: Is this generator actually endorsed by Bethesda?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. We're just huge fans with a penchant for post-apocalyptic naming conventions.  Think of us as your friendly neighborhood naming ghouls.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Fallout tabletop RPG character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely!  In fact, we encourage it.  Spread the wasteland weirdness far and wide!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! The wasteland is vast and full of possibilities. Eventually, you'll find a name that resonates with your inner survivor. If all else fails, try combining elements from different generated names to create something truly unique!

faqs.question: Are the generated names lore-friendly?
faqs.answer: We've tried to capture the spirit of Fallout, but ultimately, it's up to you to decide if a name fits your personal interpretation of the lore.  Don't be afraid to get creative!

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for ways to improve!  Feel free to send us your ideas – we might just incorporate them into the next update.  The more wonderfully weird, the better!

faqs.question: Will this generator help me find love in the wasteland?
faqs.answer: We can't guarantee it, but a cool name certainly couldn't hurt!  Who knows?  Maybe 'Vault-Tec Valerie' is just waiting to meet her 'Radical Rick'.
